医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
心率波动与婴儿言语发育有关婴儿最初的表情中轻柔的、轻柔的呢喃，就像对溺爱的父母发出的喜悦和惊奇的小声低语，实际上是婴儿的心脏随着语言发育而有节奏地工作的迹象。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Heart-rate-fluctuations-linked-to-infant-speech-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Heart-rate-fluctuations-linked-to-infant-speech-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=214d04bd-4c25-4728-9f50-68c40588850c Tue, 17 Dec 2024 20:12:56 -0500 Heart rate fluctuations linked to infant speech development
突破性的猪肾移植结束了阿拉巴马州妇女的透析纽约大学兰格尼健康中心的外科医生上个月进行了基因编辑猪肾移植手术后，一名阿拉巴马州妇女不再需要透析，健康状况也有所改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Breakthrough-pig-kidney-transplant-ends-diaanalysis-for-Alabama-woman.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Breakthrough-pig-kidney-transplant-ends-diaanalysis-for-Alabama-woman.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8d6d2efd-8f68-468d-939f-abfde2847188 Tue, 17 Dec 2024 20:00:00 -0500 Breakthrough pig kidney transplant ends dialysis for Alabama woman
强化学习在个性化患者护理方面的进展威尔康奈尔医学院和洛克菲勒大学研究人员的一项新研究发现，强化学习是一种人工智能方法，有潜力指导医生设计序贯治疗策略，以获得更好的患者结果，但在应用于临床环境之前需要进行重大改进。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Advancements-in-reinforcement-learning-for-personalized-病人-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Advancements-in-reinforcement-learning-for-personalized-病人-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a1359ab4-0d78-439d-9263-55638407a3b6 Tue, 17 Dec 2024 19:54:16 -0500 Advancements in reinforcement learning for personalized patient care
百日咳病例有所增加，但公众对该疾病的认识仍然存在在大流行期间平静了几年之后，美国各地的百日咳病例正在增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Whooping-cough-cases-on-the-rise-but-public-awareness-of-the-disease-still-persists.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Whooping-cough-cases-on-the-rise-but-public-awareness-of-the-disease-still-persists.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ffd67771-f480-4c2b-9b74-e05a898737b7 Tue, 17 Dec 2024 19:43:32 -0500 Whooping cough cases on the rise, but public awareness of the disease still persists
心房颤动的全面回顾在美国，心房颤动 (AF) 是一种导致心脏上腔心律不齐的心脏病，影响多达三分之一的人一生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/A-compressive-review-of-atrial-fibrillation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/A-compressive-review-of-atrial-fibrillation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8145911f-a7ac-4b79-8e8a-0b6d2c4da6f8 Tue, 17 Dec 2024 19:34:51 -0500 A comprehensive review of atrial fibrillation
尼安德特人的遗产：人类牙齿大小背后令人惊讶的遗传学最近的一项研究确定了导致现代人类牙齿大小变化的关键遗传因素——PITX2 表达和尼安德特人基因渗入的 HS3ST3A1，特别强调了不同血统之间的差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Neanderthal-legacy-The-surprising- Genetics-behind- human-tooth-size.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Neanderthal-legacy-The-surprising-genics-behind- human-tooth-size.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=40bfdee9-1acd-4d0a-99b5-919bbbe3327b Tue, 17 Dec 2024 18:41:00 -0500 Neanderthal legacy: The surprising genetics behind human tooth size
知道风险后，美国人仍然每天喝含糖饮料有关含糖饮料 (SSB) 的健康知识并不能显着减少高 SSB 消费，这更多地是由口味、习惯和营销驱动的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Knowing-the-risks-Americans-still-sip-sugary-beverages-daily.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Knowing-the-risks-Americans-still-sip-sugary-beverages-daily.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d6a368e1-450b-47e2-8bc0-c9470e0c8216 Tue, 17 Dec 2024 18:29:00 -0500 Knowing the risks, Americans still sip sugary beverages daily
长期新冠疫情影响了 8.4% 的美国成年人，收入和地理位置都受到影响长期新冠肺炎影响了 8.4% 的美国成年人，性别、收入和地理位置存在显着差异，限制了许多人的日常活动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Long-COVID-affects-8425-of-US-adults-with-venue-and-geography-shaping-impact.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Long-COVID-affects-8425-of-US-adults-with-venue-and-geography-shaping-impact.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a699b562-176c-4097-a0c7-4c0109e47900 Tue, 17 Dec 2024 18:09:00 -0500 Long COVID affects 8.4% of U.S. adults, with income and geography shaping impact
新疗法和技术为解决与年龄相关的生育挑战带来了希望科学家们探索了对抗生殖衰老的新兴策略，重点介绍了改善晚年生育能力的有前景的疗法和技术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/New-therapies-and-technologies-provide-hope-for-age-lated-fertility-challenges.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/New-therapies-and-technologies-provide-hope-for-age-lated-fertility-challenges.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=acf1e4c7-1473-4636-8d22-b4d132f072d1 Tue, 17 Dec 2024 17:48:00 -0500 New therapies and technologies provide hope for age-related fertility challenges
生殖特征的遗传变化与衰老和健康风险有关这项研究探讨了人类生殖特征的遗传学，揭示了与衰老、健康结果和长寿的联系，同时强调了遗传因素在现代生育能力转变中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Genetic-shifts-in-reproductive-traits-link-to-aging-and-health-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Genetic-shifts-in-reproductive-traits-link-to-aging-and-health-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b2f9e07-9fe8-4ae2-9235-4c1fbac6b519 Tue, 17 Dec 2024 17:29:00 -0500 Genetic shifts in reproductive traits link to aging and health risks
